page.description: Used with Cache component. Defines whether to cache the Tabbed UI per user, group, or a combination of both.

discussion.p: The Tabbed UI can be cached per user, per user group, or a combination of user and group.

item.name: UserNameAndSecurityGroup
item.description: Component is cached per user and group.

discussion.p: This property is only shown when *[ui:Cache component]* is checked.
